          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Cirrostratus</string>
            <string language="en-US">Cirrostratus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cirrostratus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cirrostratus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cirro-estrato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cirrostratus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Cirrostratus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cirroestrato</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Magasszintű, réteges felhő, a hidegfront előjele</string>
            <string language="en-US">High-level, layered cloud, sign of the cold front</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">éghajlati jelenség</string>
            <string language="en-US">climatic phenomena</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">levegő</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">felhőképződés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">felhőtípusok</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">vízcseppek</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">réteges és gomolyos felhők</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">alacsony, középmagas, magas szintű felhők</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hochqualifizierte, überlagerte Wolke, Zeichen der
Kaltfront</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nuage à niveau élevé et posé, signe de 
l'avant froid</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nuvem high-level, mergulhada, sinal da parte 
dianteira fria</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nube ad alto livello e fatta uno strato di, segno
della parte anteriore fredda</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υψηλού επιπέδου, βαλμένο σε στρώσεις σύννεφο, σημάδι
του κρύου μετώπου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Nube de alto nivel, acodada, muestra del frente 
frío</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">klimatische Phänomene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomènes climatiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fenômenos climáticos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fenomeni climatici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fenómenos climáticos</string>
          </keyword>
